R

Request - Class in http
Representation of a Request.
Request(Request.METHOD, String, String, HashMap<String, String>, HashMap<String, String>) - Constructor for class http.Request
Constructor of the request, it's private because a Request can only be build by Request.build(BufferedReader).
Request.MalformedRequestException - Exception in http
Custom Exception
Request.METHOD - Enum in http
List of all methods allowed by HTTP/1.1
REQUEST_TIMEOUT - Static variable in class http.WebServer
Time in seconds before a request timeout
RequestHandler - Class in http
RequestHandler is the class that wait the Request from the client and then build and send the corresponding Response
RequestHandler(Socket) - Constructor for class http.RequestHandler
Constructor of RequestHandler
Response - Class in http
Representation of a Response.
Response() - Constructor for class http.Response
Constructor by default, set a empty OK reponse (statusCode 200)
Response(int) - Constructor for class http.Response
Constructor with a specific statusCode and an empty Response.body
Response(int, String) - Constructor for class http.Response
Constructor with specific statusCode and body
rootPath - Static variable in class http.RequestHandler
Canonical path to RequestHandler.WWW_FOLDER
run() - Method in class http.RequestHandler
Thread start, the function build the request and then, if the request is valid, handle it to finally send response to the user
running - Variable in class http.RequestHandler
Flag to check if we already treated the request
